description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4m412","text":"scCUT\u0026Tag-pro is a multimodal assay for profiling histone modification coupled with the abundance of surface proteins in single cells. It was developed based on CUT\u0026Tag (Kaya-Okur et al., 2019) and scASAP-seq (Eleni Mimitou et al., 2021). Our approach is compatible with the widely used 10x Genomics Chromium system, and complements recently introduced technologies for simultaneous CUT\u0026Tag and transcriptomic profiling that leverage custom combinatorial indexing workflows.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":170,"length":22},{"key":1,"offset":210,"length":26}],"data":{}},{"key":"fn1ib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"263bo","text":"Preprint: https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.09.13.460120v1.abstract","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":10,"length":68}],"data":{}},{"key":"9vbkf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b47jh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"142492304D5611EC8F3215A32BFCCF2C","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41467-019-09982-5"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"224E36404D5611EC8F3215A32BFCCF2C","url":"https://www.nature.com/articles/s41587-021-00927-2"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"2FFB45AE4D5611ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2021.09.13.460120v1.abstract"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fub50","text":"Thaw the cryopreserved PBMCs into DMEM with 10% FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7tdei","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ehpj","text":"Spin down at 4°C for 5 min at 400 g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adkbg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1rkjf","text":"Remove the supernatant and wash cells with 1 ml PBS with 2% BSA, spin at 4˚C for 5 minutes at 400g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"904n4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72dfq","text":"Remove the supernatant and Resuspend the cells with 1 ml staining buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4g1vh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5htjc","text":"Count cells and check the cell viability. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4tuh1","text":"This website could be used to plan experiments: https://satijalab.org/costpercell/. It can help determine the number of hashes, the number of cells to load and check the expected doublet rates. (In the following protocol, five hashes are used and aim to have 15,000 cells in one 10x lane)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":34}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhdfi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h3q4","text":"Distribute the cells evenly into 5 tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qd7j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ghsq","text":"Add 2 µl hashing antibody and mix with gentle pipetting. {"blocks":[{"key":"3956i","text":"Prepare antibody pool (panel or titrated amounts) according to the manufacture. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dknog","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3as2u","text":"Add the antibody pool and incubate for 30 min on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"12dgs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7mi0a","text":"Wash cells three times with 1 ml staining buffer, spin down at 4˚C for 5 minutes at 400g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"flc78","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmv","text":"Resuspend the cells in 100 µL staining buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7savp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ls6d","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1lmn6","text":"Wash cells three times with 1 ml staining buffer, spin down at 4˚C for 5 minutes at 400g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ghpi","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e43qc","text":"After the final wash, cells are resuspended in 200 μl PBS and ready for fixation.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1e6bk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c09j","text":"Add 1.25 μl 16% formaldehyde (0.1% final concentration) and incubate 5min at room temperature. Invert occasionally.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17qn2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d32vi","text":"Quench by adding 12 µl 1.25M glycine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hqgp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dq5s","text":"Centrifuge cells for 5 min at 400 g. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tbp4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bqmlc","text":"Discard the supernatant and repeat wash twice with 1 ml ice-cold PBS. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1jph","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet with 200 µl isotonic permeabilization buffer and mix by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2udmr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m91p","text":"Incubate on ice for 7 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"rcs4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cjjar","text":"Add 1 ml wash buffer and centrifuge cells for 5 min at 800 g. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8v75","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ld1a","text":"Resuspend the cells with 150 µl antibody buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e2bi3","text":"Add 1.5 µg primary antibody to each tube and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fdatv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"226j7","text":"Place the samples on a rotator and incubate    at 4°C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"9326C5204E2911EC8F3215A32BFCCF2C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ch19","text":"The next day spin down for 5mins at 800 g and remove the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11ghn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aq3u0","text":"Wash cells one time with 150 µl washing buffer, spin down for 5 min at 800g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14o7q","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fev3b","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the cells with 150 µl wash buffer.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2q73b","text":"Add 1.5 µg secondary antibody to each tube and mix well.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eqor0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jk32","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature on a rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"alj45","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dok86","text":"Spin down for 5 min at 800 g and remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atpg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbnaa","text":"Wash cells two times with 150 µl washing buffer, spin down for 5 min at 800g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"63D55B904E2B11EC8F3215A32BFCCF2C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7odva","text":"For each sample, prepare 150 µl diluted pAG-Tn5 by mixing 7.5 µl pAG-Tn5 with 142.5 µl high salt buffer.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5p57","text":"Resuspend the cells with 150 µl diluted pAG-Tn5.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dp74","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c5o4r","text":"Incubate for   at room temperature on a rotator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2i1mr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4u2qd","text":"Spin down for 5 min at 800 g and remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ha4j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6qfo","text":"Wash cells two times with 150 µl high salt buffer, spin down for 5 min at 800g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eg02","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee73g","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the cells with 100 µl Tagmentation buffer.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"44A47E6C4E2C11ECA43B0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8a7hu","text":"Place the samples on a PCR machine with 50°C heated cap to incubate for    at 37 °C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":72,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"for79","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"863bb","text":"Prepare 1× Diluted Nuclei Buffer (10x Genomics scATAC kit).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahfqt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"771kf","text":"Add 4 μl of 0.5 M EDTA to stop the tagmentation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jl4j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds30g","text":"Spin down for 5 min at 1000 g and remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df7d6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"EC6AA6704E2D11EC8F3215A32BFCCF2C","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

the GEM incubation, please use the following PCR program (step 2.5a):  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ndrn","text":"40 °C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9308g","text":"72 °C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"89e7a","text":"98 °C for 30 s","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5m4j","text":"12 cycles of (98 °C for 10 s, 59 °C for 30 s and 72 °C for 1 min)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f93ep","text":"ending with hold at 15 °C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b798v","text":"We normally have 100K ~ 200K cells at this stage. I prefer to adjust the cell concentration to ~2500 cells/µl. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"65emi","text":"Please follow the 10x Chromium single-cell ATAC protocol (v1.1) from step 3.1a to step 3.1n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej3ge","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7lq2p","text":"During silane bead elution (Step 3.1o), if cell hashing is done, please elute beads in 46.5 µl of Elution Solution I. Otherwise elute in 43.5 μL of Elution Solution I. The extra volume is used for the cell hashing and surface protein tags library. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qe6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2upjf","text":"3.1p. Pipette mix without introducing bubbles. 
3.1q. Incubate 1 min at room temperature. 
3.1r. Centrifuge briefly. Place on the magnet•Low until the solution clears. 
3.1s.Transfer 40 μl sample to a new tube strip for CUT&Tag library, transfer 3 μl sample to another tube strip for ADT library, if cell hashing is done, transfer the remaining 3 µl sample to a third tube strip for HTO library.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2i4sm","text":"3.2a. Vortex the SPRIselect reagent until fully resuspended. Add 48 μl SPRIselect reagent to each sample. Pipette mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91l5b","text":"3.2b. Incubate 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ce66","text":"3.2c. Centrifuge briefly. Place on the magnet•High until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"94uct","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6sklm","text":"For ADT and HTO: During SPRI cleanup (Step 3.2d), the supernatant is saved and the short DNA derived from antibody oligos is purified with 2.0× SPRI beads: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f125i","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a new tube and add 32 µl SPRIselect reagent to obtain a final SPRI volume of 2X SPRI.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bnumm","text":"Incubate 10 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"db1k5","text":"Place on the magnet•High until the solution clears.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50aes","text":"Carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"528n7","text":"Add 200 μl 80% ethanol to the pellet. Wait 30 sec. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"44ari","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etkt9","text":"Add 200 μl 80% ethanol to the pellet. Wait 30 sec. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68l4m","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"avlga","text":"Centrifuge tube briefly and return it to the magnet.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etnr5","text":"Remove and discard any remaining ethanol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a62nr","text":"If cell hashing is done, resuspend in beads in 85 µl water. Otherwise, resuspend in beads in 43 µl water.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2m5ue","text":"The eluted DNA is combined with the 3 µL left aside in step 3.1s to be used as input for protein tag amplification. (For both ADT and HTO, the final volume is 42 µl + 3 µl = 45 µl)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fngqe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49upr","text":"For CUT&Tag:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"68jof","text":"Follow the protocol from Step 3.2e onwards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
